DOC.brief_summary: This randomized trial is determining the role of antibiotic prophylaxis in the prevention of the infectious complications in patients carrying out totally implantable venous access device.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Antibiotic Prophylaxis for Totally Implantable Venous Access Device
DOC.criteria: Older than 18 years of age Have solid tumor White cells >4000 Platelets >100.000 Prothrombin time in normal range Drug allergy Diabetes mellitus
